bibl.title: New Light on the Patermouthis Archive from Excavations at Aswan. When Archaeology and Papyrology Meet. Avec résumé en anglais.

series.title: Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists
BASP

bibl.note: Introduction. - 1. Recent Archaeological Evidence for the Topography of Late Antique Syene. - 2. The Topographical References in the Patermouthis Archive Reconsidered. - 3.
